Package calc

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AwtCalc
    AwtCalc.java A simple calculator that uses AWT component's.
    AwtCalcApp
    AwtCalcApp.java Allows AwtCalc to be run as a stand-alone application.
    AwtCalcApplet
    AwtCalcApplet.java Allow's AwtCalc to be run as an applet.
    ButtonHandler
    ButtonHandler.java Handle's what happen's when the button is pressed.
    CalcDisplay
    CalcDisplay.java This class creates a display screan for AwtCalc
    Memory
    Memory.java Utility class used for the calculators memory buttons
    Operator
    Operator.java Utility class used for the calculator's operators
